case_address_found_1: Found in desert in Shadow Mountain area
case_circumstances: "John Doe #02-65" - Partial skeletal remains, believed to be those of a White male adult, were found in the desert in the Shadow Mountain area.  Clothing and .22 rifle found at scene.
case_head_hair: Hair found at scene was short.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available

case_footwear: Black high-top 4 eyelet work shoes ("Thorogood by Wein-" - size 8.5), white cotton socks with garters attached,
case_other_items_with_body: .22 caliber rifle (Winchester, model 02).  Envelope with writing on front: "My ticker is getting bad." "Eds. Baker" Sen Jas(a)..." and on back: "Rust Proff Gesoleite Magazine - P.O. Box"
